    • getStudentFXID

      private String getStudentFXID(int position, boolean diningRoom, Color color, int boardID)
      Generate FX:ID of a student.
      Parameters:
      position - [0-9] Position in the board (Dining Room 0 is closer to entrance).
      diningRoom - True if student is in diningRoom; false if in entrance.
      color - Color value
      boardID - 0: own board, bottom; 1: board left to player; 2: board right to player.
      Returns:
      FX:ID of a student in scene

    • getStudentFXIDOnIsland

      private String getStudentFXIDOnIsland(int IDIsland, Color color)
      Generate FX:ID of a student on an island
      Parameters:
      IDIsland - ID of the island.
      color - color of the student.
      Returns:
      FX:ID of the student on the set island.

    • getStudentNumberFXIDOnIsland

      private String getStudentNumberFXIDOnIsland(int IDIsland, Color color)
      Generate FX:ID of the text indicating the number of students on an island.
      Parameters:
      IDIsland - ID of the island
      color - color of the student
      Returns:
      FX:ID of the text on the island of that color.

    • getProfessorFXID

      private String getProfessorFXID(int boardID, Color color)
      Generate FX:ID of a professor.
      Parameters:
      boardID - 0: own board, bottom; 1: board left to player; 2: board right to player.
      color - Color value
      Returns:
      FX:ID of a professor in scene.

      private String getCharacterCardSelectorID(int ID, boolean cost, boolean text, boolean main)
      Generates FX:ID of CharacterCard in the selector pane.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
